channel.title: Weird Performance Issue
channel.description:
Just signed up to the forum to post bugs. I did post it on the Steam forum, but I figured it'd be better seen on here.
I'm currently on chapter 8 - On a Rail. I'm at the part where you overhear two guards talking about Gordon outside. However, when going outside, the performance goes... weird. Despite my frame rate being well above 60fps, everything feels... janky. As though there's some erratic frame pacing issue when the frame rate changes. Even if I set the graphics settings to low, it's still the same. Likewise if I turn off G-Sync.
My spec:
Windows 10 Home i7 4790K MSI GTX 1080 16GB RAM And I'm running off an SSD.
